==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|じゅ|いん|yomi=o}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|じゅいん}}

# a [[cursed]] [[seal]], [[stamp]] or [[insignia]]
# making a [[vow]] while closing a [[seal]]: a [[solemn]] [[oath]]

====Antonyms====
* {{ja-r|祝印|しゅくいん}}: a [[blessed]] seal, stamp or insignia; or else making a vow while closing a seal: a solemn oath
